comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Hi, welcome to the biggest cryptocurrency forum in the world - Bitcointalk..Several casinos springing up all around and the competition is really hitting up,I believe you've been told, just to add, please get a copper membership to enable create a proper Ann, this will help your casino's visibility on the forum, also if you don't have one already, then consider hiring a designer to create some nice infographics for the Ann, I believe you've seen some casino here and how professional their Ann looks.And also consider budgeting some money into signature campaign, hire a good and reputable Manager who will manage the campaign for you, this wil bring you alot of users.Quote from: Bet24Star Casino on November 23, 2022, 02:10:05 PMOur Welcome package includes:First Deposit - 200% Match bonusSecond Deposit - 200% Match bonusThird Deposit - 200% match bonusIs there any minimum amount required to deposit for one to be eligible to access this welcome package.?Or is it available to any amount of deposit?.

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: Quote from: Bet24Star Casino on November 23, 2022, 02:30:43 PM~snip~Every licensed casino reserves the right to ask for the KYC documents from their players. You can't get Curacao license without having this KYC rules in your terms. But Bet24Star is asking for level 1 KYC details in the registration page. A few number of Curacao licensed casino ask for those documents during registration. A lot of gambler doesn't like this process.Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 23, 2022, 03:19:48 PMIs there any minimum amount required to deposit for one to be eligible to access this welcome package.?Or is it available to any amount of deposit?. There is a €10 minimum requirement to receive the 200% welcome bonusQuote from: https://bet24star.com/casino/welcome-bonusThe minimum deposit amount is €10. You will need to wager these three bonuses 50 times before it will be converted to your Real Money Balance. The wagering requirement must be met in full within 14 days of the Bonus being credited to your Bonus Balance, otherwise, the Bonus Balance will expire.

comments.author: Piesel
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk, it's good to see you here since your launch back in 2020, and also that your casino gives priority to cryptocurrency users by limiting the KYC limit to 2,000 Euros which is relatively high but not too high. Just as others have suggested, consider buying a copper member account to be able to post some other content like images because your newbie account is restricted from doing that.

comments.author: safari88
comments.body: I think the layout of the website is nice and clear. Also very attractive to users. Only there is no sportsbook available, but that may be a well-considered choice of this site. There are many payment methods available, which is a big positive point. But a reputation is the most important. The link doesn't work in the ANN as others have pointed out, and I also notice that hasn't been replaced yet. Those are things that users check and that are at the expense of the credibility of a site, if you ask me. I also like the domain name.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Good to see another good site to deal with, just like the previous suggestions here try to edit this ANN thread to a more catchy style and highlights everything about the site, copper member can be a big help. Hire as well a good marketing strategist that can help your project.Good to see as well the top game provider on this site, I’m just curious if the site ask for a KYC and until what level? Anyway, hoping that the site can be more mobile friendly so it can easily be access anywhere. What’s the difference of this site compare to the other site?

comments.body: Welcome to the forum, it's nice to see a casino that has been operating for a long time has finally added cryptocurrency as a means of payment that its users can use and has an announcement thread on this forum.Quote from: Bet24Star Casino on November 23, 2022, 02:10:05 PMBlack Friday Free Spins (November 23 - 27, 2022)50 free spins - to deposit 20 eur / 1.5 mBTC100 free spins - to deposit 50 eur / 3.2 mBTC200 free spins - to deposit 100 eur / 6.5 mBTCI've seen a casino that also has an announcement thread on this forum and also has a promotion like this and is done quite regularly.How much is the wagering requirement for the promotion above? and can one deposit get two different bonuses?Quote from: bitcampaign on November 23, 2022, 04:50:34 PM10 euro doesn't seem too high for a small player to me , at least can get a 200% bonus looking for luck in casino games seems interesting, I just created an account and still looking for other casino games there because I like any game try something new to add to my experience at the casinowelcome to the forumAnd also for the first deposit you will get a free chip or an additional balance of 0.5MBtc or € 10 chips and this is a one time present
